table.caption: Description of configuration options for images

tr.td: (ListOpt) A list of url schemes that can be downloaded directly via the direct_url. Currently supported schemes: [file].
(BoolOpt) Allow to perform insecure SSL (https) requests to glance
(ListOpt) A list of the glance api servers available to cinder ([hostname|ip]:port)

(BoolOpt) Whether to attempt to negotiate SSL layer compression when using SSL (https) requests. Set to False to disable SSL layer compression. In some cases disabling this may improve data throughput, eg when high network bandwidth is available and you are using already compressed image formats such as qcow2 .
(IntOpt) Version of the glance api to use
(IntOpt) Number retries when downloading an image from glance
(IntOpt) http/https timeout value for glance operations. If no value (None) is supplied here, the glanceclient default value is used.
(StrOpt) Directory used for temporary storage during image conversion
(StrOpt) If an instance is passed with the log message, format it like this
(StrOpt) If an instance UUID is passed with the log message, format it like this
(BoolOpt) Do we attach/detach volumes in cinder using multipath for volume to image and image to volume transfers?
